name: coderboost-frontend
description: Frontend for CoderBoost - A programming learning platform

scripts.build: vite build && npm run copy-views && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-views: if not exist dist\views mkdir dist\views && xcopy views dist\views /E /I /Y
scripts.copy-assets: if not exist dist\assets\images mkdir dist\assets\images && xcopy assets\images dist\assets\images /E /I /Y

author: CoderBoost Team
